name: Meteor Shower (itch) (Yiren Wang)
description:
Meteor Shower

Prototype Studio Week 10 - PERMANENT OR EPHEMERAL

You are observing a meteor shower with a telescope. Try to catch one and give it a name.

How to play

  • Lock - Left Click a Meteor
  • Unlock - Right Click
  • Type - Left Click the Input Field
  • Rotate - Drag Right Mouse Button
  • Restart - R
